ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT Complete heal (was Numbers on Bards)
ygData.msgSnippet: Crazy as this sounds... Try mez songs without wind instruments.  Another bard in my guild, swears that the secondary resist problem comes back if you equip a
ygData.messageBody:
Crazy as this sounds...

Try mez songs without wind instruments. Another bard in my guild, swears
that the secondary resist problem 'comes back' if you equip a wind
instrument. Me? I am too lazy to swap in the horn/flute that makes us 20%
more invisible so I can't offer any anecdotes. I use twilight w/o wind
instrument and do just fine. I tried pixie one time since they fixed mez
and got the "...your target is too high level..." failure message and just
dont bother using it since I have the other.

Sylly Songsynger
(The Pantheon)
Troubador, somewhere on Innoruuk...


-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Monday, January 22, 2001 1:32 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] OT Complete heal (was Numbers on Bards)


That's not my experience in Sebelis. I have several Minos in the bank (from
my Lguk days) and have 126 Cha Unbuffed. I get resists to Pixie a good 50
percent of the time on High Blue Yellows in Sebelis

Slyde
52 Bard
